WRITING.TEXT: I'd get in. Guy in back sheet puts gun to my head. "Drive, fast." I drive as fast as I can. Cop start chasing me. Girl unzipped me and starts giving me amazing head. I climax causing me to go off a bridge. Me and girl survive and we run away with the money they stole. I live happily ever after in mexico
At first It looked like an opening for a fifty shades of grey parody
What happens when you reenact 50 shades of grey
